name: S.U.R.V
description:
Your new work buddy! 

Manage a robot miner, upgrading it's parts to make it a more powerful, speedy and effective miner. 

Save money to buy new upgrads across 9 different robotic parts.

Each part has 10 options so there are millions of possible combinations you can assemble.  Changing parts will change your robots stats across Strength, Speed, Weight, Effeciency, Optics and Running cost. Optimise your build to be the fastest most effective money earning robot you can.

# Dev note 1

I am still tweaking the calculations of how the parts effect the robots performance, so any feedback would be appreciated.

# Dev note 2

I haven't added any music yet and the sound effects will probably be changed.
